FuncDef: The reset nhrp peer command clears dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries.

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes all dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries.
-

Specifies the name of a tunnel source interface.
-

Specifies the type of a tunnel source interface.
-

Specifies the number of a tunnel source interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In DSVPN scenarios, to delete dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries, run the following commands as required.
To delete all dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries, run the reset nhrp peer all command.
To delete all dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries on a specified interface, run the reset nhrp peer interface command.
Prerequisites
NHRP must be enabled on a tunnel interface, and NHRP parameters are configured.
